articles.title: Two Point Campus Seemingly Leaks Ahead of Official Reveal - IGN Southeast Asia
articles.description: The announcement of the follow up to Two Point Hospital appears to be imminent.
articles.content:
Two Point Campus, the follow up to Two Point Hospital, has seemingly leaked on the Microsoft Store ahead of its official reveal.
The Microsoft Store page was spotted by @_h0x0d_, and it reveals that… [+1209 chars]

articles.title: B1617 Covid-19 variant infiltrates over 50 countries: 4 reasons why it spreads so easily - AsiaOne

articles.title: Pooja Rani wins her 2nd Asian Boxing Championships gold after beating Mavluda Movlonova in 75kg final - India Today
articles.description: Pooja Rani beat her opponent from Uzbekistan by unanimous 5-0 decision to secure the first gold medal for India in this edition of the Asian Elite Boxing Championships in Dubai.
articles.content:
Indian pugilist Pooja Rani repeated her gold-medal winning performance at the Asian Elite Boxing Championships on Sunday as she beat Mavluda Movlonova in the women's 75kg final in Dubai.
Pooja, who … [+1731 chars]
